item.title: Fixing Redshift Linux
item.description: Fixing Redshift got an email about dependencies Hi benjamin​ You do not need to use the maxon App at all.

item.title: Redshift on linux
item.description: Redshift 3d setting up on linux some libraries are missing libpng15.so.15 https://sourceforge.net/projects/libpng/files/libpng15/older-releases/1.5.15/ then you have to extract it and build it .

item.title: Togology in CG Lesson
item.description: [[notes/3D-Modeling/blender/assignments/topology/Topology-Assignment-Instructions]] Understanding topology is a critical part of being a competent 3D artist. Topology is the fundamental structure of your 3D data works and relates with itself.
